UTEID: asn579
FIRSTNAME: Anthony
LASTNAME: Nguyen
CSACCOUNT: anthony
EMAIL: asnguyen1029@gmail.com

[Program 4]
[Description]
The code of Project 4 consist of two files, Encoder.java and HuffmanCode.java.
There also 4 testcases, 1 text generate file, 2 encoding files, and 2 decoding
files. Encoder.java was written by myself but I used the HuffmanCode code from
https://rosettacode.org/wiki/Huffman_coding#Java. I did make as few changes like
changing the data type of val in HuffmanLeaf from a char to a String. I also 
changed the way buildTree took parameters and creates HuffmanLeaf. It now takes
in a char array in order to pair the character with the encoding. The last 
change was adding two TreeMaps to help with key and value retrieval method.


[Finish]
My code finishes all the basic requirments. It reads in a frequency file and 
a number. It creates a two huffman encoding based on the frequency file (one
encoding for single symbol language and one for double symbol language). It then
uses the encoding to encode the generate text and it then decodes it. It calculates
the entropy of each language and the average bit ti took to encode the generated
text.

[Test Case 1]

[Command line]
java Encoder testcase1.txt  100

[Input]

[Test Case 2]

[Command line]
java Encoder testcase2.txt  50

[Input]
5
3
8
6
9
1
2

[Output]
Text from testText.txt:
EACCDCEEEBBDCCECGDAEFCCDAECEGEDDCEFCCDFCGGABDECACE

******** Single Symbol language ********
SYMBOL	WEIGHT	HUFFMAN CODE
D	6	00
C	8	01
E	9	10
A	5	110
B	3	1110
F	1	11110
G	2	11111
